title: Very Important Question
content:
In Keen 6, the first level, if you're on the branches of the trees, can you drop down from them by pressing CTRL + down?
Can you drop down from any moving platform in Keen4-6?

My old comp aint working, so I can't check [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img] - .... . <> ..- -. .. ...- . .-. ... . <> .. ... <> - --- .- ... -

title: re
content: Yes. As far as i know, any platform which moves you can jump down from.

title: Re: re
content: yeah but what about the trees? Can u drop down from the branches? I want to know if ramps exists that are drop-down, not solid. It is very important to know too.- .... . <> ..- -. .. ...- . .-. ... . <> .. ... <> - --- .- ... -

title: re
content:
Yes.

And why don't you just download DOSBOX and play keen on it?

title: Re: re
content:
lol dude, i aint got anything but keen1 and 4 on this comp; you don't want me to [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-pirate.gif[/img] do u
anyway, thanks, but...
i was hoping you couldn't drop down from trees; that means i gotta make two different kinds of ramps; soild and drop-down; garg- .... . <> ..- -. .. ...- . .-. ... . <> .. ... <> - --- .- ... -

title: Re: re
content:
You can drop through the small flat branches, like the one with the blue blooglet at the start of the first level, but not from the big slanted ones.________________
[img]http://img80.imageshack.us/img80/8498/missouriansf9.png[/img]
